mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_type_img( room_type_sid, original_name, img_name, extension ) VALUES ( #{roomTypeSid}, #{originalName}, #{imgName}, #{extension} )
mapper.select: SELECT RT.*,TI.img_name FROM tb_room_type as RT LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_type_img as TI ON RT.room_type_sid = TI.room_type_sid ORDER BY room_type_sid DESC
